item.description:
Met up with a local climber at Rimmon today. He has been climbing the local venue for 20+ years.. He got mad with the conditions at Rimmon as of late and got busy , not unlike our endevours , he cleaned it up himself,,,then took it to the next level.The MAYOR and the Govenor's office. He has has success! Cematary and Parks and Rec. officials of Manchester, met with him and seeing his and our work efforts has authorised a full crew along with an armey of volunteers to the cliff for this Saturday ( October 23ed) 9am till dark. They will have a wood chipper, A brush hog and chain saws...Racks leave blowers ect ect...the idea is to open up the lower slopes...so the police can be a more successful of a deterant at the cliff. There will be food for the volunteers and the police may be bringing there horse detail. Come one come all...and help out "OUR" Urban Climbing Area. This is years in the making..our efforts have payed off...the local climbers taking back "OUR" cliff !!! Please join us !!!
SEAN
item.name: Major clean up at Rock Rimmon
